title.value: Assessment of requirement for reclamative equipment for implementation of the existing program of preservation and use of the reclaimed lands
Оценка потребности в мелиорирующей технике для выполнения действующей программы сохранения и использования мелиорированных земель

subject.value: mata©riel de mise en valeur du sol

person.name: Levin, G.U., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute for Land Reclamation

abstract.value: Calculation of the requirements for the main specialized ameliorative equipment for realization of the State program 'Preservation and use of the reclaimed lands during 2011-2015' is presented in the article. Standards of requirement for equipment on 1000 hectares of the reclaimed area taking into account planned volumes of reconstruction and restoration of ameliorative systems are developed; regulations aimed on carrying out of agro-ameliorative actions on ameliorative systems and maintenance of the ameliorative systems are enumerated. Necessary number of drainage and irrigation equipment according to the annual plan is calculated; wear-out percentage of working equipment is analyzed. Deficiency of technical means necessary for land reclamation work according the State program is measured. Specialized means of small-scaled mechanization along with task-specific drainage and irrigation equipment are suggested. The most important directions of engineering and development of specialized land reclamation equipment are outlined; utilization of national and foreign equipment is compared and analyzed; economic efficiency is calculated.
